thread.title: Pomona College failed to properly handle sex abuse cases, complaint alleges
thread.title_full: Pomona College failed to properly handle sex abuse cases, complaint alleges - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Pomona College failed to properly handle sex abuse cases, complaint alleges
text: Teresa WatanabeContact Reporter Pomona College has failed to adequately respond to complaints of campus sexual violence, creating a hostile environment for students based on their gender, according to a complaint filed to federal education
